name: Pixel Diving
description:
I am a diver and student at Indiana University - Purdue University at Indianapolis, or IUPUI for short.  I have always loved mobile diving games, but I could never find one that had everything that I wanted to have as a diver.  This game is going to be my attempt at making the best diving game that I am capable of making.

I can't make it the best game all by myself though, so I will be using this page to get feedback from other divers/game developers on how the game is doing and things I should add in the future.  I hope this game can become the best diving game made for divers by divers!  

Thank you for all of your help!
